name: Daybreak Health
headline: The first digital mental health system for youth
description: Daybreak offers comprehensive and clinically-validated online mental health services designed for youth, like teletherapy, psychiatry and digital education.  We partner with schools and pediatric groups to make access to services easy, and strive to deliver zero cost to the end consumer through insurance and government funding.

founders.name: Alex Alvarado, Founder
founders.description:
Hi, I'm Alex.  At Daybreak we're building the first digital mental health clinic for young people. 
I've spent the last decade building digital health products since graduating Stanford '12.  In my free time (very little these days), I enjoy running ultramarathons, DJing, and reading.

# **Mental health support to help every kid and family thrive**
Daybreak partners with schools to provide therapy for kids and families that‚Äôs covered by health insurance. Our care programs are personalized to each family‚Äôs unique needs

## A family story: Meet Clifford
 _"__Daybreak saved my son's life!"_ - Clifford's MomWatch this powerful story told directly by Clifford, his mom, and school counselor about how Daybreak improved his mental health and the trajectory of his life for the better.
[![Play Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bac3de8f242d758b850cba/64bfe1f82dccc6aa3992f1a1_sa.svg)Watch Clifford‚Äôs Story](https://www.daybreakhealth.com/<#>)
## Empowering kids to be their best selves.
When kids are mentally healthy, they can think clearly, pay better attention, and learn new skills. Our evidence-based teletherapy programs for K-12 students have proven to positively impact academic outcomes like behavioral improvements, better grades, and higher attendance.
![Girls smiling and happy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bac3de8f242d758b850cba/64bf36aae1daccd7e93e58e7_Modo_de_isolamento.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bac3de8f242d758b850cba/64bf36aa61bc3b0f8b143110_Vedctor.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bac3de8f242d758b850cba/64bacf6c69dd68c8eaba21af_Group%2057254.svg)
[Let‚Äôs Talk](https://www.daybreakhealth.com/</contact-us>)

## Why Daybreak
When it comes to mental health care, one size does not fit all. That‚Äôs why Daybreak‚Äôs programs are designed for each student‚Äôs unique needs‚Äîwith proven clinical and academic outcomes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bac3de8f242d758b850cba/64bf36aa5d5520c9b75ee796_Mask%20Group.png)
### Proven outcomes
Your schools are successful when your students are. Our evidence-based teletherapy programs have proven to drive behavioral improvements, better grades, and higher attendance.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bac3de8f242d758b850cba/64bf36aa75a6c9c3705c46a5_Untitled_Artwork%2010%201.png)
### Full treatment cycle
Unlike other providers who offer short-term transitional care, our model treats students to a place of concrete improvement‚Äîsymptomatically, functionally, and behaviorally‚Äîover the course of their 12+ week program.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bac3de8f242d758b850cba/64bf36aace0d963e95f15252_leaf_icon%201.png)
### Flexible for individual needs
Specific student subpopulations are at a higher risk of mental health challenges including youth who identify as BIPOC, LGBTQ+, or are low income, living in rural areas, and/or experiencing homelessness. We have specialized sub-programs built for their unique needs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bac3de8f242d758b850cba/64bf36aa2cb97e10ce0d90ae_Masdk%20Group.png)
### Best fit with onsite teams
School-based teams love Daybreak because it allows them to quickly expand capacity and give more students access to high-quality mental health support. They can easily make referrals and it‚Äôs a mental health program that is highly utilized‚Äînot just a ‚Äúcheck-the-box‚Äù solution.

generated_description:
### Daybreak Health: A Quick Dive

**Mission**: Daybreak Health is on a mission to revolutionize mental health care for youth through its digital platform. They aim to provide comprehensive, clinically-validated mental health services that make therapy accessible and affordable for young people and their families.

**Overview**: Founded in 2020 and based out of San Francisco, Daybreak Health emerged from Y Combinator‚Äôs Batch S20. The company offers an array of online mental health services, including teletherapy, psychiatric consultations, and digital education, specifically tailored for children and adolescents.

**Partnerships and Accessibility**: To tackle the critical issue of access, Daybreak Health partners with schools and pediatric groups. This collaboration streamlines the process for students and their families, ensuring that services are easy to reach and often presented at zero cost thanks to coverage through insurance and government funding.

**Team and Growth**: The Daybreak team consists of 20 people led by Group Partner Aaron Epstein. Their close-knit team focuses on enhancing mental health access for youth across the country.

**Services Offered**:
- **Teletherapy**: Personalized therapy sessions focused on the unique needs of K-12 students.
- **Onsite Mental Health Programs**: In-person therapy provided by onsite clinicians at partner schools.
- **Mental Health Classes & Resources**: Educational classes aimed at broadening understanding and coping strategies for mental health.
- **Universal Screeners**: Tools designed to identify mental health needs early, facilitating timely interventions.

**Impact**: Daybreak Health‚Äôs programs demonstrate measurable success:
- 80% of school staff report improvements in attendance, grades, and behavior.
- 81% of students showed improvement on standard mental health assessments (GAD/PHQ scales).
- 92% of families noted positive behavioral changes at home.

**Community Engagement**: Trusted by numerous school districts representing over 1.5 million students, Daybreak Health is committed to working in partnership with educators to provide meaningful support and resources tailored to the specific challenges students face.

**Contact and More Information**: To explore more about what Daybreak Health offers or to get involved, visit [Daybreak Health's website](https://www.daybreakhealth.com).

In short, Daybreak Health is doing vital work at the intersection of technology and mental health care, proving that accessible services can drive significant change for our youth.
